title: IpInfo connector
description: Accurate IP address data that keeps pace with secure, specific, and forward-looking use cases

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.
OPENCTI_TOKEN.title: Opencti Token

CONNECTOR_ID.description: A unique UUIDv4 identifier for this connector instance.
CONNECTOR_ID.title: Connector Id

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to EXTERNAL_IMPORT for this connector.
CONNECTOR_TYPE.title: Connector Type

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is importing, either a MIME type or Stix Object (for information only).
CONNECTOR_SCOPE.title: Connector Scope

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.
CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.title: Connector Log Level

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: Duration between two scheduled runs of the connector (ISO 8601 format).
CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.title: Connector Duration Period

CONNECTOR_QUEUE_THRESHOLD.description: Connector queue max size in Mbytes. Default to 500.
CONNECTOR_QUEUE_THRESHOLD.title: Connector Queue Threshold

SERVICENOW_INSTANCE_NAME.description: Corresponds to server instance name (will be used for API requests).
SERVICENOW_INSTANCE_NAME.title: Servicenow Instance Name

SERVICENOW_API_KEY.description: Secure identifier used to validate access to ServiceNow APIs.
SERVICENOW_API_KEY.title: Servicenow Api Key

api_version.description: ServiceNow API version used for REST requests.
api_version.title: Api Version

api_leaky_bucket_rate.description: Bucket refill rate (in tokens per second). Controls the rate at which API calls are allowed. For example, a rate of 10 means that 10 calls can be made per second, if the bucket is not empty.
api_leaky_bucket_rate.title: Api Leaky Bucket Rate

api_leaky_bucket_capacity.description: Maximum bucket capacity (in tokens). Defines the number of calls that can be made immediately in a burst. Once the bucket is empty, it refills at the rate defined by 'api_leaky_bucket_rate'.
api_leaky_bucket_capacity.title: Api Leaky Bucket Capacity

api_retry.description: Maximum number of retry attempts in case of API failure.
api_retry.title: Api Retry

api_backoff.description: Exponential backoff duration between API retries (ISO 8601 duration format).
api_backoff.title: Api Backoff

import_start_date.description: Start date of first import (ISO date format).
import_start_date.title: Import Start Date

state_to_exclude.description: List of security incident states to exclude from import.
state_to_exclude.title: State To Exclude

severity_to_exclude.description: List of security incident severities to exclude from import.
severity_to_exclude.title: Severity To Exclude

priority_to_exclude.description: List of security incident priorities to exclude from import.
priority_to_exclude.title: Priority To Exclude

comment_to_exclude.description: List of comment types to exclude: private, public, auto
comment_to_exclude.title: Comment To Exclude

tlp_level.description: Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) level to apply on objects imported into OpenCTI.
tlp_level.title: Tlp Level

observables_default_score.description: Allows you to define a default score for observables and indicators when the 'promote_observables_as_indicators' variable is set to True.
observables_default_score.title: Observables Default Score

promote_observables_as_indicators.description: Boolean to promote observables into indicators.
promote_observables_as_indicators.title: Promote Observables As Indicators
